String.string: Helvarian's research is too vital to interrupt. Help him however you can.
I'll let Elben know how helpful you were. Thanks.
Kill one {@linkcreature:47#1001#Tirkai Grizzly}, {@linkcreature:47#1002#Argonomorph Tirkai grizzly}, and {@linkcreature:47#1003#Argonomorph Mugato}.
Kill two {@linkcreature:47#1001#Tirkai Grizzlies}, {@linkcreature:47#1002#Argonomorph Tirkai Grizzlies}, and {@linkcreature:47#1003#Argonomorph Mugatos}.
Kill three {@linkcreature:47#1001#Tirkai Grizzlies}, {@linkcreature:47#1002#Argonomorph Tirkai Grizzlies}, and {@linkcreature:47#1003#Argonomorph Mugatos}.
